@description: "Atomic mass unit, unified is mass unit, symbol: [u
column10: AMU]. Definition of 1 atomic mass unit, unified ≡ 1.66053904 × 10^-27 kg. The unified atomic mass unit or dalton is a standard unit of mass that quantifies mass on an atomic or molecular scale (atomic mass).."

@title: Atomic unit of mass, electron rest mass
@description: Atomic unit of mass, electron rest mass is mass unit, symbol: [me]. Definition of 1 atomic unit of mass, electron rest mass ≡ 9.10938356 × 10^-31 kg. .
Bag (coffee) is mass unit. Definition of 1 bag (coffee) ≡ 60 kg . .
Bag (Portland cement) is mass unit. Definition of 1 bag (Portland cement) ≡ 94 lb av . ≡ 94 × 0.45359237 kg.
Barge is mass unit. Definition of 1 barge ≡ 22 1⁄2 short ton . ≡ 20411.65665 kg.
Carat is mass unit, symbol: [kt]. Definition of 1 carat ≡ 3 1⁄6 gr . ≡ 19/6 grain ≡ 205.1965483 mg.
Carat (metric) is mass unit, symbol: [ct]. Definition of 1 carat (metric) ≡ 200 mg . The carat (ct) is a unit of mass equal to 200 mg and is used for measuring gemstones and pearls (metric carat).
Centigram is metric mass unit, symbol: [cg]. Definition of 1 Centigram ≡1x10^-5 kg. .
Clove is mass unit. Definition of 1 clove ≡ 8 lb av . ≡ 8 × 0.45359237 kg.
Crith is mass unit. Definition of 1 crith ≡ 89.9349 mg. .

Dalton is mass unit, symbol: [Da]. Definition of 1 dalton ≡ 1.66053904 × 10^-27 kg. Dalton (Da) or the unified atomic mass unit is a standard unit of mass that quantifies mass on an atomic or molecular scale (atomic mass)..
Decagram is metric mass unit, symbol: [dag]. Definition of 1 Decagram ≡10^-2 kg. .

@description: Dram (avoirdupois) is mass unit, symbol: [dr av]. Definition of 1 dram (avoirdupois) ≡ 27 11⁄32 gr ≡ 27.34375 gr. The dram was originally both a coin and a weight in ancient Greece. ≡ 875/32 grain ≡ 1.7718451953125 g.
Gamma is mass unit, symbol: [γ]. Definition of 1 gamma ≡ 1 μg . ≡ 1 μg.
Grain is mass unit, symbol: [gr]. Definition of 1 grain ≡ 1⁄7000 lb av . The grain is the same in avoirdupois, troy, and apothecaries units of mass, ≡ 64.79891 mg.
Gram is metric mass unit, symbol: [g]. Definition of 1 Gram ≡1x10^-3 kg. .
Grave is mass unit, symbol: [gv.]. Definition of 1 grave ≡ 1 kg. grave was the original name of the kilogram .
Hectogram is metric mass unit, symbol: [hg]. Definition of 1 Hectogram ≡10^-1 kg. .
Hundredweight (long) is mass unit, symbol: [long cwt or cwt]. Definition of 1 hundredweight (long) ≡ 112 lb av . ≡112 × 0.45359237 kg ≡ 50.80234544 kg.

@description: Kilogram is metric mass unit, symbol: [kg]. Definition of 1 Kilogram ≡ 1 kg. SI base unit. Mass of the prototype near Paris (≡ mass of 1 L of water) .

Kip is mass unit, symbol: [kip]. Definition of 1 kip ≡ 1000 lb av . A kip is a unit of force, uncommon, it is occasionally also considered a unit of weight, equal to 1000 pounds. ≡1000 × 0.45359237 kg.

Mark is mass unit. Definition of 1 mark ≡ 8 oz t . The Mark is originally a medieval weight or mass unit, which supplanted the pound weight as a precious metals and coinage weight from the 11th century ≡ 248.8278144 g.
Microgram is metric mass unit, symbol: [µg]. Definition of 1 Microgram ≡1x10^-9 kg. .
Milligram is metric mass unit, symbol: [mg]. Definition of 1 Milligram ≡1x10^-6 kg. .
Mite is mass unit. Definition of 1 mite ≡ 1⁄20 gr . ≡ 1 grain / 20 ≡ 3.2399455 mg.
Mite (metric) is mass unit. Definition of 1 mite (metric) ≡ 1⁄20 g . ≡ 50 mg.
Nanogram is metric mass unit, symbol: [ng]. Definition of 1 Nanogram ≡1x10^-12 kg. .

Ounce (US food nutrition labelling) is mass unit, symbol: [oz]. Definition of 1 ounce (US food nutrition labelling) ≡ 28 g. The ounce (abbreviated oz) is a unit of mass used in most British derived customary systems of measurement..

Pound (metric) is mass unit. Definition of 1 pound (metric) ≡ 500 g . ≡ 500 g ≡ 0.5 kg.
Pound (troy) is mass unit, symbol: [lb t]. Definition of 1 pound (troy) ≡ 5760 grains . 64.79891 g × 5760 ≡ 0.3732417216 kg.
Quarter (imperial) is mass unit. Definition of 1 quarter (imperial) ≡ 1⁄4 long cwt ≡ 2 st ≡ 28 lb av . 28 × 0.45359237 kg.
Quarter (informal) is mass unit. Definition of 1 quarter (informal) ≡ 1⁄4 short ton . ≡ 907.18474 kg / 4.
Quarter, long (informal) is mass unit. Definition of 1 quarter, long (informal) ≡ 1⁄4 long ton . ≡ 1016.0469088 kg / 4.
Quintal (metric) is mass unit, symbol: [q]. Definition of 1 quintal (metric) ≡ 100 kg . .
Scruple (apothecary) is mass unit, symbol: [s ap]. Definition of 1 scruple (apothecary) ≡ 20 gr . 20 × 0.06479891 g ≡ 1.2959782 g.

Ton, assay (short) is mass unit, symbol: [AT]. Definition of 1 ton, assay (short) ≡ 1 mg × short ton / oz t . ≡ 29.1(6) g.
